@dev returns the total amount of the burned governance tokens
 @return total amount of the burned governance tokens

devdoc.details: This contract provides any user to trigger a network fee burning event

BurnRewardUpdated(uint32,uint32,uint256,.details: triggered when the burn reward has been changed

params.newBurnReward: the new burn reward (in units of PPM)
params.prevBurnReward: the previous burn reward (in units of PPM)

Burned(address[],uint256,uint256).details: triggered after a completed burning event

params.burnedAmount: the total burned amount in the burning event
params.sourceAmount: the total network token amount the tokens were converted to

Converted(address,uint256,uint256).details: triggered during conversion of a single token during the burning event

params.sourceAmount: the amount of the converted reserve token
params.targetAmount: the network token amount the token were converted to

acceptNetworkFeeOwnership().details: accepts the ownership of he network fee wallet

acceptOwnership().details: used by a new owner to accept an ownership transfer

burn(address[]).details: converts the provided tokens to governance tokens and burns them

burnReward().details: returns the burn reward percentage and its maximum amount

returns._0: the burn reward percentage and its maximum amount

params.govTokenGovernance: the address of the governance token security module
params.networkToken: the address of the network token
params.registry: the address of the contract registry

restrictRegistryUpdate(bool).details: restricts the permission to update the contract-registry

params._onlyOwnerCanUpdateRegistry: indicates whether or not permission is restricted to owner only

setBurnReward(uint32,uint256).details: allows the owner to set the burn reward percentage and its maximum amount

params.newBurnReward: the percentage of the converted network tokens to be sent to the caller of the burning event (in units of PPM)
params.newMaxBurnRewardAmount: the maximum burn reward to be sent to the caller of the burning event

totalBurnedAmount().details: returns the total amount of the burned governance tokens

returns._0: total amount of the burned governance tokens

transferNetworkFeeWalletOwnership(addres.details: transfers the ownership of the network fee wallet

params.newOwner: the new owner of the network fee wallet

transferOwnership(address).details: allows transferring the contract ownership the new owner still needs to accept the transfer can only be called by the contract owner
